SEARCH
Package Model

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
Model.GameObject
Model.MovableObject
Model.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Observable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player, PowerUp
public abstract class Entity extends MovableObject implements Observable
The Entity class represents a movable entity in the game that can jump, attack, and be observed by multiple observers. It extends the MovableObject class and implements the Observable interface.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(double x, double y, int height, int width)
      Constructs an Entity with the specified position and size, initializing its movement and action-related variables.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the entity
      y - the y-coordinate of the entity
      height - the height of the entity
      width - the width of the entity

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public boolean attack()
      Triggers the attack action for the entity. Sets the attack flag and records the start time.
      Returns:
      true if the attack was initiated successfully, false if attack was already true

    • setJump

      public void setJump()
      Sets the entity to jump if it is not currently falling or jumping.

    • applyGravity

      public void applyGravity(List<GameObject> others)
      Applies gravity to the entity and checks for collisions with other objects. If the entity hits the ground, it stops falling.
      Specified by:
      applyGravity in class MovableObject
      Parameters:
      others - a list of other GameObjects for collision detection

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition(List<GameObject> others)
      Updates the entity's position and manages movement, gravity, and collision detection.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class MovableObject
      Parameters:
      others - a list of other GameObjects for collision detection
